# THIS IS A GENERATED FILE.
#
# Source template:
# added_folders/templates/common/scripted_effects/godherja/GH_hunt_effects.txt.jinja
#
# Please avoid manually editing this file: your changes WILL be overwritten when it gets regenerated.
# Instead, edit the source template and/or variables, then run render_templates.bat .

# Hunt effects for the modern PDX hunting system. If you want to see effects from the old GH one, see GH_old_hunt_effects

# Modify the likeliness of encountering a creature on a traditional hunt.
# Is only checked if scope:huntable_local_game exists, which is only triggered through the hunt_activity_standard effect
@huntability_factor_none = 0 # Spirits, constructs, and creatures way too dangerous for a pleasure hunt
@huntability_factor_very_low = 0.1 # It's questionable why you'd ever want to hunt a horse or a bee, but never say never
@huntability_factor_low = 0.5 # Very dangerous animals some drunk lords might still sometimes want a go at
@huntability_factor_average = 1 # The average beast
@huntability_factor_high = 2 # Deer, boar, giant crabs - standard hunt fodder
@huntability_factor_extreme = 10 # Seriously in danger of extinction people love killing it so much

#####################################################################
# EFFECT LIST
#####################################################################
# !!! Remember to add all new effects with a short description here !!!
#

#hunt_end_pulse_effect
#select_local_animal_effect

######################################################################
# EFFECTS
######################################################################


#Used to merge together the vanilla hunting effect lists into one, since GH has multiple lists of its own
#and keeping the creatures consistent across all lists is a mess (and it's questionable why PDX wanted to
#keep the lists split in the first place). All creatures you could conceivably hunt in GH are listed here
#Note: Don't add more here without also revisiting artifact creation for Skulls and hides.
#Note: May save any of below scopes before running the effect to limit possible animals: 
## Vanilla Game Types
	## big_local_game
	## small_local_game
	## dangerous_local_game
	## harmless_local_game
	## prowling_local_game
## GH Game Types # GH TODO: Distribute these and add any more we might want
	## magical_local_game
	## fodder_local_game (low level adventurer fodder)
	## humanoid_local_game
	## intelligent_local_game
	## inorganic_local_game
	## enormous_local_game
	## monstrous_local_game
	## incorporeal_local_game
	## extremely_dangerous_game_effect

# Because of the way this system is structured, in order to keep things clean we can't, for example, say
# a creature *is* a prowler, we need to specify every creature that isn't one. In order to keep things consistent
# across all the GH monster types, each creature should have the block from above copy and pasted for its trigger,
# and should have ones that don't apply commented out instead of marked no

gh_select_animal_effect = {
	save_scope_as = $TYPE$_local_game
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	hidden_effect = {
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# hare
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_hare_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_rabbit_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_brown_hare_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_white_hare_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_desert_hare_trigger = no
					}
					NOR = {
						exists = scope:vermin_local_game
						exists = scope:managed
						exists = scope:herding
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_big

					}

				# Increase larger deer chance with management buildings
				hunt_activity_game_building_modifier = { PROVINCE = scope:animal_location }
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:red_deer years = 3 }

						GH_hunt_animal_blackbuck_trigger = yes
					}
					NOR = {
						exists = scope:small_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_small
						exists = scope:vermin_local_game
						exists = scope:dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:monstrous_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_skull
						exists = scope:lives_in_caves
						exists = scope:trophy_hide
						exists = scope:predator

						exists = scope:trophy_toxin

						exists = scope:monstrous_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:standard_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:small_local_sea_game
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				# Master of Hunt aptitude affects chance of managed game
				hunt_activity_master_aptitude_positive_modifier = { LIEGE = root }
				# Increase larger deer chance with management buildings
				hunt_activity_game_building_modifier = { PROVINCE = scope:animal_location }
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:blackbuck years = 3 }
			}

				# Beasthunter lifestyle lets you access extra monster hunt activity options
				GH_hunt_activity_monster_hunt_type_modifier = yes
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:ooze years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# devi
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_devi_trigger = yes
					}
					NOR = {
						exists = scope:standard_local_game
						exists = scope:small_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_small
						exists = scope:herbivore
						exists = scope:vermin_local_game
						exists = scope:managed
						exists = scope:herding
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_big
						exists = scope:dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:lives_in_caves
						exists = scope:trophy_hide
						exists = scope:intelligent
						exists = scope:trophy_toxin
						exists = scope:falconry_local_game
						exists = scope:migratory
						exists = scope:falconry_nonstandard_local_game
						exists = scope:falconry_big_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_feather
						exists = scope:humanoid_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_bone
						exists = scope:magical_local_game
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_game
						exists = scope:trophy_generic
						exists = scope:trophy_gem
						exists = scope:incorporeal_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_essence
						exists = scope:trophy_crystal
						exists = scope:trophy_gargoyle
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:dangerous_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:monstrous_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:standard_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:small_local_sea_game
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				# Beasthunter lifestyle lets you access extra monster hunt activity options
				GH_hunt_activity_monster_hunt_type_modifier = yes
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:devi years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# devouring brittlestar
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_devouring_brittlestar_trigger = yes
					}
					NOR = {
						exists = scope:standard_local_game
						exists = scope:small_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_small
						exists = scope:herbivore
						exists = scope:vermin_local_game
						exists = scope:managed
						exists = scope:herding
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_big
						exists = scope:dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:monstrous_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_skull
						exists = scope:lives_in_caves
						exists = scope:trophy_hide
						exists = scope:predator
						exists = scope:intelligent
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_toxin
						exists = scope:falconry_local_game
						exists = scope:migratory
						exists = scope:falconry_nonstandard_local_game
						exists = scope:falconry_big_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_feather
						exists = scope:humanoid_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_bone
						exists = scope:magical_local_game
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_game
						exists = scope:trophy_generic
						exists = scope:trophy_gem
						exists = scope:incorporeal_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_essence
						exists = scope:trophy_crystal
						exists = scope:trophy_gargoyle
						exists = scope:standard_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:small_local_sea_game
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:devouring_brittlestar years = 3 }
			}

				trigger = {

						exists = scope:trophy_toxin
						exists = scope:falconry_local_game
						exists = scope:migratory

						exists = scope:humanoid_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_bone
						exists = scope:magical_local_game

						exists = scope:small_local_sea_game

			0 = {	# reef automaton
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_reef_automaton_trigger = yes
					}
					NOR = {

						exists = scope:falconry_local_game

						exists = scope:falconry_nonstandard_local_game
						exists = scope:falconry_big_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_feather
						exists = scope:humanoid_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_bone
						exists = scope:magical_local_game
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_game
						exists = scope:trophy_generic
						exists = scope:trophy_gem
						exists = scope:incorporeal_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_essence
						exists = scope:trophy_crystal
						exists = scope:trophy_gargoyle
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:standard_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:small_local_sea_game
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:reef_automaton years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# sea scorpion
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_sea_scorpion_trigger = yes
					}
					NOR = {
						exists = scope:standard_local_game
						exists = scope:small_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_small
						exists = scope:herbivore
						exists = scope:vermin_local_game
						exists = scope:managed
						exists = scope:herding
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_big
						exists = scope:dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:monstrous_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_skull
						exists = scope:lives_in_caves
						exists = scope:trophy_hide
						exists = scope:predator
						exists = scope:intelligent
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_toxin
						exists = scope:falconry_local_game
						exists = scope:migratory
						exists = scope:falconry_nonstandard_local_game
						exists = scope:falconry_big_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_feather
						exists = scope:humanoid_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_bone
						exists = scope:magical_local_game
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_game
						exists = scope:trophy_generic
						exists = scope:trophy_gem
						exists = scope:incorporeal_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_essence
						exists = scope:trophy_crystal
						exists = scope:trophy_gargoyle
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:standard_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:small_local_sea_game
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:sea_scorpion years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# seal
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_seal_trigger = yes
					}
					NOR = {
						exists = scope:standard_local_game
						exists = scope:small_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_small

						exists = scope:trophy_skull
						exists = scope:lives_in_caves
						exists = scope:trophy_hide
						exists = scope:predator
						exists = scope:intelligent
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_toxin
						exists = scope:falconry_local_game
						exists = scope:migratory
						exists = scope:falconry_nonstandard_local_game
						exists = scope:falconry_big_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_feather
						exists = scope:humanoid_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_bone
						exists = scope:magical_local_game
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_game
						exists = scope:trophy_generic
						exists = scope:trophy_gem
						exists = scope:incorporeal_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_essence
						exists = scope:trophy_crystal
						exists = scope:trophy_gargoyle
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:dangerous_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:monstrous_local_sea_game
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:seal years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# abyssal monstrosity
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_abyssal_monstrosity_trigger = yes
					}
					NOR = {
						exists = scope:standard_local_game
						exists = scope:small_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_small
						exists = scope:herbivore
						exists = scope:vermin_local_game
						exists = scope:managed
						exists = scope:herding
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_big
						exists = scope:dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:monstrous_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_skull
						exists = scope:lives_in_caves
						exists = scope:trophy_hide
						exists = scope:predator
						exists = scope:intelligent
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_toxin
						exists = scope:falconry_local_game
						exists = scope:migratory
						exists = scope:falconry_nonstandard_local_game
						exists = scope:falconry_big_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_feather
						exists = scope:humanoid_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_bone
						exists = scope:magical_local_game
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_game
						exists = scope:trophy_generic
						exists = scope:trophy_gem
						exists = scope:incorporeal_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_essence
						exists = scope:trophy_crystal
						exists = scope:trophy_gargoyle
						exists = scope:dangerous_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:standard_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:small_local_sea_game
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:abyssal_monstrosity years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# sea apparition
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_sea_apparition_trigger = yes
					}
					NOR = {
						exists = scope:standard_local_game
						exists = scope:small_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_small
						exists = scope:herbivore
						exists = scope:vermin_local_game
						exists = scope:managed
						exists = scope:herding
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_big
						exists = scope:dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:monstrous_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_skull
						exists = scope:lives_in_caves
						exists = scope:trophy_hide
						exists = scope:predator
						exists = scope:intelligent
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_toxin
						exists = scope:falconry_local_game
						exists = scope:migratory
						exists = scope:falconry_nonstandard_local_game
						exists = scope:falconry_big_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_feather
						exists = scope:humanoid_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_bone
						exists = scope:magical_local_game
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_game
						exists = scope:trophy_generic
						exists = scope:trophy_gem
						exists = scope:incorporeal_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_essence
						exists = scope:trophy_crystal
						exists = scope:trophy_gargoyle
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:standard_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:small_local_sea_game
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:sea_apparition years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# torkyll
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_torkyll_trigger = yes
					}
					NOR = {
						exists = scope:standard_local_game
						exists = scope:small_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_small
						exists = scope:herbivore
						exists = scope:vermin_local_game
						exists = scope:managed
						exists = scope:herding
						exists = scope:trophy_hide_big
						exists = scope:dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:monstrous_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_skull
						exists = scope:lives_in_caves
						exists = scope:trophy_hide
						exists = scope:predator
						exists = scope:intelligent
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_toxin
						exists = scope:falconry_local_game
						exists = scope:migratory
						exists = scope:falconry_nonstandard_local_game
						exists = scope:falconry_big_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_feather
						exists = scope:humanoid_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_bone
						exists = scope:magical_local_game
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_game
						exists = scope:trophy_generic
						exists = scope:trophy_gem
						exists = scope:incorporeal_local_game
						exists = scope:trophy_essence
						exists = scope:trophy_crystal
						exists = scope:trophy_gargoyle
						exists = scope:extremely_dangerous_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:standard_local_sea_game
						exists = scope:small_local_sea_game
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:torkyll years = 3 }
			}
		}
		# Fallback
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { exists = var:animal_type } }
			set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:boar years = 3 }
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_hare_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_hare_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# hare
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_hare_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_rabbit_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_brown_hare_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_white_hare_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_desert_hare_trigger = no
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:hare years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# rabbit
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_rabbit_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:rabbit years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# brown hare
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_brown_hare_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:brown_hare years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# white hare
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_white_hare_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:white_hare years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# desert hare
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_desert_hare_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:desert_hare years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_rodent_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_rodent_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# rodent
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_rodent_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_porcupine_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_mongoose_trigger = no
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 90
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:rodent years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# porcupine
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_porcupine_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:porcupine years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# mongoose
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_mongoose_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:mongoose years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_deer_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_deer_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# true deer
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_true_deer_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_red_deer_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_eastern_deer_trigger = no
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:true_deer years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# red deer
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_red_deer_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_reacher_red_deer_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_tragoneian_stag_trigger = no
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:red_deer years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# Reacher red deer
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_reacher_red_deer_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:reacher_red_deer years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# Tragoneian stag
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_tragoneian_stag_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:tragoneian_stag years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# eastern deer
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_eastern_deer_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:eastern_deer years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# fallow deer
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_fallow_deer_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_royal_deer_trigger = no
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:fallow_deer years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# Sarradonian royal deer
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_royal_deer_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:sarradonian_royal_deer years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# roe
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_roe_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:roe years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# hog deer
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_hog_deer_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_chital_trigger = no
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:hog_deer years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# chital
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_chital_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:chital years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# dire stag
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_dire_stag_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 25
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:dire_stag years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_antelope_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_antelope_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# blackbuck
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_blackbuck_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:blackbuck years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# gazelle
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_gazelle_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_white_gazelle_trigger = no
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:gazelle years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# white gazelle
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_white_gazelle_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:white_gazelle years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# oryx
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_oryx_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:oryx years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# screwhorn antelope
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_screwhorn_antelope_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:screwhorn_antelope years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# saiga
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_saiga_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:saiga years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_sloth_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_sloth_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# Three Toed Sloth
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_three_toed_sloth_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 100
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:three_toed_sloth years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# Opakhasian Bear
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_opakhasian_bear_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:opakhasian_bear years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# Bin Nalmicaa
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_bin_nalmicaa_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:bin_nalmicaa years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_buffalo_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_buffalo_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# true buffalo
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_true_buffalo_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_bubalus_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_peninsular_buffalo_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_anoa_trigger = no
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:true_buffalo years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# bubalus
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_bubalus_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:bubalus years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# peninsular buffalo
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_peninsular_buffalo_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:peninsular_buffalo years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# anoa
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_anoa_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:anoa years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# bison
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_bison_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_wood_bison_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_steppe_bison_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_gaur_trigger = no
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:bison years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# wood bison
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_wood_bison_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:wood_bison years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# steppe bison
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_steppe_bison_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:steppe_bison years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# gaur
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_gaur_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:gaur years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_elephantid_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_elephantid_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# mammoth
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_mammoth_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_wooly_mammoth_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_daggertusk_mammoth_trigger = no
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:mammoth years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# wooly mammoth
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_wooly_mammoth_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:wooly_mammoth years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# daggertusk mammoth
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_daggertusk_mammoth_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:daggertusk_mammoth years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# elephant
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_elephant_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_damotan_elephant_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_elephant_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_elephant_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_dwarf_elephant_trigger = no
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:elephant years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# damotan elephant
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_damotan_elephant_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 75
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 75
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:damotan_elephant years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# sarradonian elephant
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_elephant_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:sarradonian_elephant years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# kashiryan elephant
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_kashiryan_elephant_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 45
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:kashiryan_elephant years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# dwarf elephant
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_dwarf_elephant_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:dwarf_elephant years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_fox_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_fox_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# red fox
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_red_fox_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:red_fox years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# sand fox
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_sand_fox_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:sand_fox years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# fennec fox
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_fennec_fox_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:fennec_fox years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_pig_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_pig_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# pig
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_pig_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_boar_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_dire_boar_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_warthog_trigger = no
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:pig years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# boar
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_boar_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:boar years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# dire boar
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_dire_boar_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:dire_boar years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# warthog
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_warthog_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:warthog years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_canine_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_canine_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# wolf
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_wolf_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:wolf years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# steppe wolf
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_steppe_wolf_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 55
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:steppe_wolf years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# jackal
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_jackal_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:jackal years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# lymrill
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_lymrill_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:lymrill years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# crocotta
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_crocotta_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 35
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:crocotta years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# apep-ibizan
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_apep-ibizan_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 75
					scope:animal_location = {
						has_province_modifier = extreme_desert_modifier
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:apep-ibizan years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# kursha
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_kursha_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:kursha years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_bear_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_bear_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# brown bear
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_brown_bear_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:brown_bear years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# Aervalrbear
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_aervalrbear_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:aervalrbear years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# sun bear
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_sun_bear_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:sun_bear years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# sloth bear
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_sloth_bear_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:sloth_bear years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# owlbear
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_owlbear_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 35
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:owlbear years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_big_cat_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_big_cat_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# lion
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_lion_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:lion years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# tinessian lion
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_tinessian_lion_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
