						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:tinessian_lion years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# leopard
				trigger = {

						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {

					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 25

					}
				}
				modifier = {

					}
				}
				modifier = {

					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:leopard years = 3 }

			0 = {	# snow leopard
				trigger = {

						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version

					}
				}

					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:clouded_leopard years = 3 }

					}

GH_hunt_activity_goat_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_goat_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# ibex
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_ibex_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 55
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 55
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:ibex years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# tahr
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_tahr_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 55
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:tahr years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# markhor
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_markhor_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 55
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:markhor years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_rhinoceros_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_rhinoceros_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# rhinoceros
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_rhinoceros_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_karkadann_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_armazli_rhinoceros_trigger = no
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 65
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:rhinoceros years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# karkadann
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_karkadann_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 45
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 35
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:karkadann years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# armazli rhinoceros
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_armazli_rhinoceros_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 35
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:armazli_rhinoceros years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}

	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_primate_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# monkey
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_monkey_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 65
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 65
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 45
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:monkey years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# gorilla
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_gorilla_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 65
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 65
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 45
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:gorilla years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# lemur
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_lemur_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_ring-tailed_lemur_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_brown_lemur_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_black_lemur_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_indri_trigger = no
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:lemur years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# ring-tailed lemur
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_ring-tailed_lemur_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:ring-tailed_lemur years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# brown lemur
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_brown_lemur_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:brown_lemur years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# black lemur
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_black_lemur_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:black_lemur years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# indri
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_indri_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:indri years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_bat_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_bat_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# bat
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_bat_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_vampire_bat_trigger = no
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:bat years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# vampire bat
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_vampire_bat_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:vampire_bat years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}

						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 25
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 25
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 25
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:dabchick years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# horned grebe
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_horned_grebe_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:horned_grebe years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# silver grebe
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_silver_grebe_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}

				}
				modifier = {

					}
				}
				modifier = {

				}
				modifier = {

					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {

					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20

				}

				}
				modifier = {

					}
				}
				modifier = {

				}

					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:silver_grebe years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# loon
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_loon_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_common_loon_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_red-throated_loon_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_arctic_loon_trigger = no
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:loon years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# common loon
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_common_loon_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:common_loon years = 3 }

			0 = {	# red-throated loon
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_red-throated_loon_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {

					}
				}

					}

			0 = {	# arctic loon
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_arctic_loon_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:arctic_loon years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_gamebird_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_gamebird_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# quail
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_quail_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_common_quail_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_jungle_bush_quail_trigger = no
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:quail years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# common quail
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_common_quail_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {

					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:imperial_partridge years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# chukar
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_chukar_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 100
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 100
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:chukar years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# grey partridge
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_grey_partridge_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 80
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60

						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:grey_partridge years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# snow partridge
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_snow_partridge_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60

						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40

						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:snow_partridge years = 3 }

			0 = {	# rock partridge
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_rock_partridge_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:rock_partridge years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# sand partridge
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_sand_partridge_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:sand_partridge years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# crested partridge
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_crested_partridge_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:crested_partridge years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# mountain bamboo partridge
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_mountain_bamboo_partridge_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:mountain_bamboo_partridge years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_ground_bird_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_ground_bird_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# crownbird
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_crownbird_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 70
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:crownbird years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}

					}
				}
				modifier = {

					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20

						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:sunbird years = 3 }

GH_hunt_activity_raptor_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_raptor_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# eagle
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_eagle_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_steppe_eagle_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_eagle_trigger = no
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:eagle years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# steppe eagle
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_steppe_eagle_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 35
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 25
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:steppe_eagle years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# sarradonian eagle
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_sarradonian_eagle_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:sarradonian_eagle years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# roc
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_roc_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:roc years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# falcon
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_falcon_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_royal_falcon_trigger = no
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:falcon years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# royal falcon
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_royal_falcon_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:royal_falcon years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}
GH_hunt_activity_giant_reptile_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_giant_reptile_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# naga
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_naga_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:naga years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# coatl
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_coatl_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:coatl years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# running raptor
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_running_raptor_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:running_raptor years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# roaring lizard
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_roaring_lizard_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:roaring_lizard years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# akapura
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_akapura_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:akapura years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# tarasque
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_tarasque_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:tarasque years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}

		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_giant_insect_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# adze
				trigger = {

				}
				modifier = {

					}
				}

					}

				}

						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:giant_bee years = 3 }

				trigger = {

						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:giant_spider years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# ukhinbooum
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_ukhinbooum_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {

					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 25
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {

					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:ukhinbooum years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# bhramar
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_bhramar_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 25
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:bhramar years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# myrmeke
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_myrmeke_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:myrmeke years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# false hydra
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_false_hydra_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 5
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:false_hydra years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# ugkilrrrmag
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_ugkilrrrmag_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:ugkilrrrmag years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# ubir
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_ubir_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 15
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:ubir years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}

GH_hunt_activity_manticore_game_effect = {
	$PROVINCE$ = { save_scope_as = animal_location }
	if = {
		limit = { scope:animal_location = { GH_hunt_animal_manticore_trigger = yes } }
		random_list = {
			0 = {	# manticore
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_manticore_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
						GH_hunt_animal_malcoisic_manticore_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_shahmaran_trigger = no
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 40
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:manticore years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# malcoisic manticore
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_malcoisic_manticore_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 10
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:malcoisic_manticore years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# shahmaran
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_shahmaran_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 60
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:shahmaran years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}

						GH_hunt_animal_death_jelly_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_mold_thing_trigger = no
						GH_hunt_animal_ooze_trigger = no
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_jungle_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_floodplains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 50
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_wetlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_oasis_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_forest_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_plains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_farmlands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_hills_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_steppe_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 20
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_taiga_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = 30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_archipelagic_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -100
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -100
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:slime years = 3 }
			}
			0 = {	# common slime
				trigger = {
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_hunt_animal_common_slime_trigger = yes
						# If a more specific regional variant is available, always choose that over the generic version
					}

				}

					add = -100

					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -100
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_desert_mountains_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					add = -30
					scope:animal_location = {
						GH_any_drylands_terrain_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = { name = $VARIABLE$ value = flag:ooze years = 3 }
			}
		}
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_from_death_effect = {
	$DEAD$ = {
		switch = {
			trigger = death_reason
			death_hare = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:hare } }
			}
			death_rabbit = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:rabbit } }
			}
			death_brown_hare = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:brown_hare } }
			}
			death_white_hare = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:white_hare } }
			}
			death_desert_hare = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:desert_hare } }
			}
			death_rodent = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:rodent } }
			}
			death_porcupine = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:porcupine } }
			}
			death_mongoose = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:mongoose } }
			}
			death_deer = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:deer } }
			}
			death_true_deer = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:true_deer } }
			}
			death_red_deer = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:red_deer } }
			}
			death_reacher_red_deer = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:reacher_red_deer } }
			}
			death_tragoneian_stag = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:tragoneian_stag } }
			}
			death_eastern_deer = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:eastern_deer } }
			}
			death_fallow_deer = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:fallow_deer } }
			}
			death_sarradonian_royal_deer = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:sarradonian_royal_deer } }
			}
			death_roe = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:roe } }
			}
			death_hog_deer = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:hog_deer } }
			}
			death_chital = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:chital } }
			}
			death_dire_stag = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:dire_stag } }
			}
			death_antelope = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:antelope } }
			}
			death_blackbuck = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:blackbuck } }
			}
			death_gazelle = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:gazelle } }
			}
			death_white_gazelle = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:white_gazelle } }
			}
			death_oryx = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:oryx } }
			}
			death_screwhorn_antelope = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:screwhorn_antelope } }
			}
			death_saiga = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:saiga } }
			}
			death_elk = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:elk } }
			}
			death_sloth = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:sloth } }
			}
			death_three_toed_sloth = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:three_toed_sloth } }
			}
			death_opakhasian_bear = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:opakhasian_bear } }
			}
			death_bin_nalmicaa = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:bin_nalmicaa } }
			}
			death_buffalo = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:buffalo } }
			}
			death_true_buffalo = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:true_buffalo } }
			}
			death_bubalus = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:bubalus } }
			}
			death_peninsular_buffalo = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:peninsular_buffalo } }
			}
			death_anoa = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:anoa } }
			}
			death_bison = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:bison } }
			}
			death_wood_bison = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:wood_bison } }
			}
			death_steppe_bison = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:steppe_bison } }
			}
			death_gaur = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:gaur } }
			}
			death_elephantid = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:elephantid } }
			}
			death_mammoth = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:mammoth } }
			}
			death_wooly_mammoth = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:wooly_mammoth } }
			}
			death_daggertusk_mammoth = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:daggertusk_mammoth } }
			}
			death_elephant = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:elephant } }
			}

			death_devouring_worm = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:devouring_worm } }
			}
			death_manticore = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:manticore } }
			}
			death_malcoisic_manticore = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:malcoisic_manticore } }
			}
			death_shahmaran = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:shahmaran } }
			}
			death_chimera = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:chimera } }
			}
			death_gajara = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:gajara } }
			}
			death_hieracosphinx = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:hieracosphinx } }
			}
			death_pegasus = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:pegasus } }
			}
			death_peluda = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:peluda } }
			}
			death_pooka = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:pooka } }
			}
			death_spriggan = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:spriggan } }
			}

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:wood_woad } }
			}

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:forest_spriggan } }
			}

			}
			death_wildfire_spriggan = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:wildfire_spriggan } }
			}
			death_cedar_spriggan = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:cedar_spriggan } }
			}
			death_elemental = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:elemental } }
			}
			death_rock_giant = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:rock_giant } }
			}
			death_living_blizzard = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:living_blizzard } }
			}
			death_whisperwind = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:whisperwind } }
			}

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:manzasiri } }

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:banshee } }

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:cor } }
			}
			death_djinn = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:djinn } }

			}
			death_doyarchu = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:doyarchu } }
			}

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:leviathan } }

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:swamp_leviathan } }

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:wyrm } }

			}
			death_common_slime = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:common_slime } }
			}
			death_slimeling = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:slimeling } }
			}

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:bloodslime } }
			}
			death_fireslime = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:fireslime } }
			}

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:death_jelly } }
			}

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:mold_thing } }
			}
			death_ooze = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:ooze } }
			}

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:devi } }
			}

			}

				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:guardian_hammerhead } }
			}
			death_hippocampus = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:hippocampus } }
			}
			death_merbeast = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:merbeast } }
			}
			death_dire_crab = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:dire_crab } }
			}
			death_reef_automaton = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:reef_automaton } }
			}
			death_sea_scorpion = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:sea_scorpion } }
			}
			death_seal = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:seal } }
			}
			death_abyssal_monstrosity = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:abyssal_monstrosity } }
			}
			death_sea_apparition = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:sea_apparition } }
			}
			death_torkyll = {
				$TARGET$ = { set_variable = { name = animal_type value = flag:torkyll } }
			}
		}
	}
}

GH_hunt_animal_death_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = { exists = $VAR$ }
		if = {	# This is here because having the 'if' be at the start of jinja loop below is complicated
			limit = { always = no }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:hare }
			death = { death_reason = death_hare }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:rabbit }
			death = { death_reason = death_rabbit }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:brown_hare }
			death = { death_reason = death_brown_hare }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:white_hare }
			death = { death_reason = death_white_hare }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:desert_hare }
			death = { death_reason = death_desert_hare }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:rodent }
			death = { death_reason = death_rodent }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:porcupine }
			death = { death_reason = death_porcupine }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:mongoose }
			death = { death_reason = death_mongoose }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:deer }
			death = { death_reason = death_deer }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:true_deer }
			death = { death_reason = death_true_deer }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:red_deer }
			death = { death_reason = death_red_deer }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:reacher_red_deer }
			death = { death_reason = death_reacher_red_deer }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:tragoneian_stag }
			death = { death_reason = death_tragoneian_stag }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:eastern_deer }
			death = { death_reason = death_eastern_deer }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:fallow_deer }
			death = { death_reason = death_fallow_deer }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:sarradonian_royal_deer }
			death = { death_reason = death_sarradonian_royal_deer }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:roe }
			death = { death_reason = death_roe }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:hog_deer }
			death = { death_reason = death_hog_deer }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:chital }
			death = { death_reason = death_chital }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:dire_stag }
			death = { death_reason = death_dire_stag }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:antelope }
			death = { death_reason = death_antelope }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:blackbuck }
			death = { death_reason = death_blackbuck }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:gazelle }
			death = { death_reason = death_gazelle }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:white_gazelle }
			death = { death_reason = death_white_gazelle }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:oryx }
			death = { death_reason = death_oryx }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:screwhorn_antelope }
			death = { death_reason = death_screwhorn_antelope }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:saiga }
			death = { death_reason = death_saiga }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:elk }
			death = { death_reason = death_elk }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:sloth }
			death = { death_reason = death_sloth }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:three_toed_sloth }
			death = { death_reason = death_three_toed_sloth }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:opakhasian_bear }
			death = { death_reason = death_opakhasian_bear }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:bin_nalmicaa }
			death = { death_reason = death_bin_nalmicaa }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:buffalo }
			death = { death_reason = death_buffalo }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:true_buffalo }
			death = { death_reason = death_true_buffalo }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:bubalus }
			death = { death_reason = death_bubalus }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:peninsular_buffalo }
			death = { death_reason = death_peninsular_buffalo }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:anoa }
			death = { death_reason = death_anoa }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:bison }
			death = { death_reason = death_bison }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:wood_bison }
			death = { death_reason = death_wood_bison }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:steppe_bison }
			death = { death_reason = death_steppe_bison }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:gaur }
			death = { death_reason = death_gaur }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:elephantid }
			death = { death_reason = death_elephantid }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:mammoth }
			death = { death_reason = death_mammoth }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:wooly_mammoth }
			death = { death_reason = death_wooly_mammoth }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:daggertusk_mammoth }
			death = { death_reason = death_daggertusk_mammoth }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:elephant }
			death = { death_reason = death_elephant }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:damotan_elephant }
			death = { death_reason = death_damotan_elephant }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:sarradonian_elephant }
			death = { death_reason = death_sarradonian_elephant }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:kashiryan_elephant }
			death = { death_reason = death_kashiryan_elephant }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:dwarf_elephant }
			death = { death_reason = death_dwarf_elephant }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:aurochs }
			death = { death_reason = death_aurochs }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:fox }
			death = { death_reason = death_fox }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:red_fox }
			death = { death_reason = death_red_fox }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:sand_fox }
			death = { death_reason = death_sand_fox }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:fennec_fox }
			death = { death_reason = death_fennec_fox }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:pig }
			death = { death_reason = death_pig }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:boar }
			death = { death_reason = death_boar }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:dire_boar }
			death = { death_reason = death_dire_boar }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:warthog }
			death = { death_reason = death_warthog }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:canine }
			death = { death_reason = death_canine }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:wolf }
			death = { death_reason = death_wolf }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:steppe_wolf }
			death = { death_reason = death_steppe_wolf }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:jackal }
			death = { death_reason = death_jackal }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:lymrill }
			death = { death_reason = death_lymrill }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:crocotta }
			death = { death_reason = death_crocotta }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:apep-ibizan }
			death = { death_reason = death_apep-ibizan }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:kursha }
			death = { death_reason = death_kursha }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:hyena }
			death = { death_reason = death_hyena }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:bear }
			death = { death_reason = death_bear }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:brown_bear }
			death = { death_reason = death_brown_bear }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:aervalrbear }
			death = { death_reason = death_aervalrbear }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:sun_bear }
			death = { death_reason = death_sun_bear }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:sloth_bear }
			death = { death_reason = death_sloth_bear }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:owlbear }
			death = { death_reason = death_owlbear }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:big_cat }
			death = { death_reason = death_big_cat }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:lion }
			death = { death_reason = death_lion }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:tinessian_lion }
			death = { death_reason = death_tinessian_lion }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:leopard }
			death = { death_reason = death_leopard }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:snow_leopard }
			death = { death_reason = death_snow_leopard }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:tiger }
			death = { death_reason = death_tiger }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:clouded_leopard }
			death = { death_reason = death_clouded_leopard }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:caracal }
			death = { death_reason = death_caracal }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:cheetah }
			death = { death_reason = death_cheetah }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:lynx }
			death = { death_reason = death_lynx }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:panther }
			death = { death_reason = death_panther }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:fossa }
			death = { death_reason = death_fossa }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:goat }
			death = { death_reason = death_goat }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:ibex }
			death = { death_reason = death_ibex }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:tahr }
			death = { death_reason = death_tahr }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:markhor }
			death = { death_reason = death_markhor }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:hippopotamus }
			death = { death_reason = death_hippopotamus }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:rhinoceros }
			death = { death_reason = death_rhinoceros }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:karkadann }
			death = { death_reason = death_karkadann }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:armazli_rhinoceros }
			death = { death_reason = death_armazli_rhinoceros }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:primate }
			death = { death_reason = death_primate }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:monkey }
			death = { death_reason = death_monkey }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:gorilla }
			death = { death_reason = death_gorilla }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:lemur }
			death = { death_reason = death_lemur }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:ring-tailed_lemur }
			death = { death_reason = death_ring-tailed_lemur }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:brown_lemur }
			death = { death_reason = death_brown_lemur }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:black_lemur }
			death = { death_reason = death_black_lemur }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:indri }
			death = { death_reason = death_indri }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:bat }
			death = { death_reason = death_bat }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:vampire_bat }
			death = { death_reason = death_vampire_bat }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:snake }
			death = { death_reason = death_snake }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:king_cobra }
			death = { death_reason = death_king_cobra }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:emperor_cobra }
			death = { death_reason = death_emperor_cobra }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:twin-serpent }

		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:mold_thing }
			death = { death_reason = death_mold_thing }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:ooze }
			death = { death_reason = death_ooze }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:devi }
			death = { death_reason = death_devi }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:devouring_brittlestar }
			death = { death_reason = death_devouring_brittlestar }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:crystalline_wisp }
			death = { death_reason = death_crystalline_wisp }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:guardian_hammerhead }
			death = { death_reason = death_guardian_hammerhead }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:hippocampus }
			death = { death_reason = death_hippocampus }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:merbeast }
			death = { death_reason = death_merbeast }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:dire_crab }
			death = { death_reason = death_dire_crab }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:reef_automaton }
			death = { death_reason = death_reef_automaton }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:sea_scorpion }
			death = { death_reason = death_sea_scorpion }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:seal }
			death = { death_reason = death_seal }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:abyssal_monstrosity }
			death = { death_reason = death_abyssal_monstrosity }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:sea_apparition }
			death = { death_reason = death_sea_apparition }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { $VAR$ = flag:torkyll }
			death = { death_reason = death_torkyll }
		}
		else = {
			death = { death_reason = death_maimed_by_wild_beast }
		}
	}
	else = {
		death = { death_reason = death_maimed_by_wild_beast }
	}
}

####################
# ARTIFACT EFFECTS #
####################

GH_add_artifact_aspects_from_animal_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:bin_nalmicaa
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = stone VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:bin_nalmicaa
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:lymrill
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:lymrill
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = metal VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:crocotta
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = air VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:apep-ibizan
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = fire VALUE = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:apep-ibizan
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = stone VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:duck
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = air VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:duck
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = water VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:mallard
		}

	}

			$VAR$ = flag:mallard

			$VAR$ = flag:snow_partridge
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = stone VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:rock_partridge
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = air VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:rock_partridge
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = stone VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:sand_partridge
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = air VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:sand_partridge
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = stone VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:crested_partridge
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = air VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:crested_partridge
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = stone VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:mountain_bamboo_partridge
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = air VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:mountain_bamboo_partridge
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = stone VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:flamingo
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = air VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:flamingo
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = water VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:flamingo
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = dream VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:adze
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = ethereal VALUE = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:adze
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = blood VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:dire_mosquito
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = blood VALUE = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:giant_bee
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:giant_bee
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = air VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:giant_spider
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = dream VALUE = 3 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:ukhinbooum
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = blood VALUE = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:ukhinbooum
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = death VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:bhramar
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = air VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:bhramar
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:myrmeke
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = stone VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:myrmeke
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = blood VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:false_hydra
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:false_hydra
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = dark VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:ugkilrrrmag
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = blood VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:ubir
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = blood VALUE = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:dreadleech
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = blood VALUE = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:chimera
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = stone VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:chimera
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:chimera
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = blood VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:spriggan
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 3 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:wood_woad
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 3 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:meadow_spriggan
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 3 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:forest_spriggan
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 3 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:leshen
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 3 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:wildfire_spriggan
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 3 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:cedar_spriggan
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = nature VALUE = 3 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:manzasiri
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = stone VALUE = 3 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:spirit
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = ethereal VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:banshee
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = ethereal VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:cor
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = fire VALUE = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:djinn
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = light VALUE = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:shade
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = dark VALUE = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:shetani
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = ethereal VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:fortune_eater
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = death VALUE = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:leviathan
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = water VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:swamp_leviathan
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = water VALUE = 1 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:fireslime
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = fire VALUE = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:death_jelly
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = death VALUE = 2 }
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			$VAR$ = flag:devi
		}
		add_artifact_aspect_modifier_effect = { NAME = death VALUE = 1 }
	}
}

GH_animal_artifact_wealth_quality_effect = {
	save_scope_value_as = {
		name = quality
		value = {
			value = 0
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:excellent_animal_artifacts
				}
				add = 500
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					GH_creature_prestige_tier_01_trigger = { VAR = scope:owner.var:animal_type }
				}
				add = { 0 30 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					GH_creature_prestige_tier_02_trigger = { VAR = scope:owner.var:animal_type }
				}
				add = { 30 60 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					GH_creature_prestige_tier_03_trigger = { VAR = scope:owner.var:animal_type }
				}
				add = { 60 90 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					GH_creature_prestige_tier_04_trigger = { VAR = scope:owner.var:animal_type }
				}
				add = { 90 120 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					GH_creature_prestige_tier_05_trigger = { VAR = scope:owner.var:animal_type }
				}
				add = { 120 150 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					GH_creature_prestige_tier_06_trigger = { VAR = scope:owner.var:animal_type }
				}
				add = { 150 180 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					GH_creature_prestige_tier_07_trigger = { VAR = scope:owner.var:animal_type }
				}
				add = { 180 210 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					GH_creature_prestige_tier_08_trigger = { VAR = scope:owner.var:animal_type }
				}
				add = { 210 240 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					GH_creature_prestige_tier_09_trigger = { VAR = scope:owner.var:animal_type }
				}
				add = { 240 270 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					GH_creature_prestige_tier_10_trigger = { VAR = scope:owner.var:animal_type }
				}
				add = { 270 300 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { scope:legendary ?= yes }
				multiply = 2
			}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = scope:impressive_trophy }
				multiply = 1.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = var:pet_name }
				multiply = 2
			}
			if = {
				limit = { scope:owner ?= { has_perk = trophy_collector_perk } }
				multiply = 2
			}
		}
	}
	save_scope_value_as = {
		name = wealth
		value = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:excellent_animal_artifacts
				}
				add = 500
			}
			if = {
				# If our artifact already has a quality, set base wealth equal to 1/4th quality value.
				limit = { exists = scope:quality }
				add = scope:quality
				multiply = 0.5
				round = yes
			}
			else = {
				add = 10 # Otherwise, set base wealth value to 10.
			}
			scope:creator = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_trait = lifestyle_hunter }
					add = 10
				}
				# Trophy Collector Bonus
				if = {
					limit = { has_perk = trophy_collector_perk }
					add = 10
				}
			}
			if = { # Falconry Exp
				limit = {
					exists = scope:activity
					scope:activity = {
						has_activity_type = activity_hunt
						has_activity_option = { category = special_type option = hunt_type_falconry }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:creator = {
							hunt_lifestyle_track_greater_equal_trigger = { TRACK = falconer GREATER_EQUAL = 50 }
						}
					}
					add = 10
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:creator = {
							hunt_lifestyle_track_greater_equal_trigger = { TRACK = falconer GREATER_EQUAL = 100 }
						}
					}
					add = 10
				}
			}
			## GH
			else_if = { # Slayer Exp
				limit = {
					exists = scope:activity
					scope:activity = {
						has_activity_type = activity_hunt
						has_activity_option = { category = special_type option = hunt_type_monster_hunt }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:creator = {
							hunt_lifestyle_track_greater_equal_trigger = { TRACK = beasthunter GREATER_EQUAL = 50 }
						}
					}
					add = 10
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:creator = {
							hunt_lifestyle_track_greater_equal_trigger = { TRACK = beasthunter GREATER_EQUAL = 100 }
						}
					}
					add = 10
				}
			}
			##
			else = { # Hunter Exp
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:creator = {
							hunt_lifestyle_track_greater_equal_trigger = { TRACK = hunter GREATER_EQUAL = 50 }
						}
					}
					add = 10
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:creator = {
							hunt_lifestyle_track_greater_equal_trigger = { TRACK = hunter GREATER_EQUAL = 100 }
						}
					}
					add = 10
				}	
			}
		}
	}
}
